roleset.name: publish

example.name: transitive
example.text: Dow Jones publishes The Wall Street Journal, Barron's magazine, and community newspapers and operates financial news services and computer data bases.
example.arg: The Wall Street Journal, Barron's magazine, and community newspapers

example.name: published in
example.text: Mr. Bond indicated [the consolidated debt figures, which include debt of units such as Bell Group Ltd.]-1, will be published *trace*-1 soon in Bond Corp.'s 1989 annual accounts.

roleset.note: Member of Vncls create-26.4-1. All checked by Julia, 10/2010.

frameset.note: Frames file for 'publish' based on sentences in financial subcorpus.
